resources.string: Mahāvishnu Goswāmi App is collection of kirtans, Vaishnava Bhajans and lectures on Bhagavad Gita, Srimada Bhagavatam, Chaitanya Charitamrita and more by His Holiness Mahāvishnu Goswāmi Maharaja.\n Mahāvishnu Goswāmi is a Vaishnava sanyassi (a monk in a Krishna-bhakti lineage) connecte to ISKCON and teacher of the devotional path of Bhakti-yoga.
With Mahāvishnu Goswāmi App, you have access to vast collection of His Holiness Mahāvishnu Goswāmi\'s lectures and kirtans, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s Books, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s daily quotes.
